bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Jack Smittle to Emilie Lawrence Reed, June 1, 1927

div1.p: This letter, written by a student of Edith R. Force, thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for the life and work of Walter Reed.

div1.head: Letter from Jack Smittle to Emilie Lawrence Reed, June 1, 1927
div1.p:
We are very thankful for
all your husband & you have did
for humanity, I have never had
the yellow fever but I know how
it feels.

I go to Woodrow Wilson Jr.
high, Our science teacher Mrs.
Force was reading to us & she
told us we had ought to be thank-
ful enough to your letter of thanks
